text: Mordechai Spiegler is a retired Israeli soccer player, born on August 19, 1944. He was raised in Asbest, Russia. His stats were 3 matches, 1 goal, 0 yellow cards, and he was placed 2nd in Israeliâ€™s all time goalscoring list.
